name: A metalic room
desc: You wake up in a strange metal room with 4 doors.

name: Room with a Locked gate
desc:
A simple room with a locked gate to the north, and 2 other doors beside the one you came from. 
 The locked door has a green lock on it with a hole for a strange key

name: The hammer room
desc: You have entered a room with a hammer lying on the floor, it could be useful you should grab it

name: Outside
desc: Congratulations You Have Made It Outside and Finished The Game
